verbs.description: Before [ARG1: she] [V: married] [ARG2: Donald Trump Jr] , Vanessa Trump nearly tied the knot with Saudi Prince Khalid bin Bandar bin Sultan Al Saud , but the two abruptly broke up after the 9/11 terrorist attacks .
